verses.verse: Now it happened on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H635>Esther<s%> put <S%H3847>on<s%> her <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H5975>clothing,<s%> and stood in the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> next <S%H5227>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> in the <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> next <S%H5227>to<s%> the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

When the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> in the <S%H2691>court,<s%> she <S%H5375>obtained<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> held <S%H3447>out<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>scepter<s%> that was in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%> So <S%H635>Esther<s%> came <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H8275>scepter.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>asked<s%> <S%H4436>her,<s%> "What would you like, queen <S%H635>Esther?<s%> What is your <S%H1246>request?<s%> It shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> you even to the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>"

<S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "If it seems <S%H2895>good<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> let the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> to the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that I have prepared for <S%H6213>him.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Bring <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H4116>quickly,<s%> so that it may be <S%H6213>done<s%> as <S%H635>Esther<s%> has <S%H1697>said.<s%>" So the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that <S%H635>Esther<s%> had <S%H6213>prepared.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> at the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> "What is your <S%H7596>petition?<s%> It shall be <S%H5414>granted<s%> <S%H1246>you.<s%> What is your request? Even to the <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>performed.<s%>"
Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H7596>petition<s%> and my request is <S%H1246>this.<s%>

If I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and if it <S%H2895>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H5414>grant<s%> my <S%H7596>petition<s%> and to <S%H6213>perform<s%> my <S%H1246>request,<s%> let the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that I will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for <S%H6213>them,<s%> and I will do <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> as the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1697>said.<s%>"

Then <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8056>joyful<s%> and <S%H2896>glad<s%> of <S%H3820>heart,<s%> but when <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate,<s%> that he <S%H6965>didn't<s%> stand up nor <S%H2111>move<s%> for <S%H2001>him,<s%> he was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2534>wrath<s%> against <S%H4782>Mordecai.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H662>restrained<s%> <S%H935>himself,<s%> and went <S%H1004>home.<s%> <S%H7971>There,<s%> he sent and <S%H935>called<s%> for his <S%H157>friends<s%> and <S%H2238>Zeresh<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H2001>Haman<s%> <S%H5608>recounted<s%> to them the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1121>children,<s%> all the things in which the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H1431>promoted<s%> <S%H5375>him,<s%> and how he had advanced him above the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

<S%H2001>Haman<s%> also <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H635>"Yes,<s%> Esther the <S%H4436>queen<s%> let no man come <S%H935>in<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> to the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> that she had <S%H6213>prepared<s%> but <S%H4279>myself;<s%> and tomorrow I am also <S%H7121>invited<s%> by her together with the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
Yet all this <S%H7737>avails<s%> me <S%H6256>nothing,<s%> so long as I <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> at the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate.<s%>"

Then <S%H2238>Zeresh<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and all his <S%H157>friends<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6086>him,<s%> "Let a gallows be <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H1364>high,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> about <S%H8518>hanging<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> on <S%H935>it.<s%> Then go in <S%H8056>merrily<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> to the <S%H4960>banquet.<s%>" <S%H1697>This<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> so he <S%H6213>had<s%> the <S%H6086>gallows<s%> <S%H6213>made.<s%>
